casebody.data:
[Belknap,

December, 1889.] Winnipiseogee Lake Cotton and Wollen Mfg. Co. v. Gilford. Appeal, from the refusal of selectmen to abate a tax. E. A. & C. B. Hibbard and D. Barnard, for the plaintiffs. Jewell & Stone and S. C. Clark, for the defendants. Doe, C. J.

It is not deemed advisable to consider the reserved question of evidence before a trial of the case.

Case discharged.

Smith, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
